name: 新物理－大型強子對撞機
description: This course covers (a) the Standard Mode (SM) of particle physics as well as new physics with elementary particles and fundamental interactions beyond the SM, and (b) parton model for proton-proton collisions to test the Standard Model and to search for new physics at hadron colliders. In addition, we will introduce tools such as MadGraph and skills such as root analysis to search for new physics at the Large Hadron Collider (LHC) and future colliders.
goals: Build up student’s ability to predict production rate and decay branching ratio of particles
Train student to apply root analysis to study simulated data for new physics search at the Large Hadron Collider
syllabus:
第一週 Introduction of theStandard Model

第二週 Quantum Electrodynamics

第三週 Introduction to SU(2)

第四週 Non-Abelian Gauge Theory

第五週 Electroweak theory

第六週 Strong Interaction and Quantum Chromodynamics

第七週 Green Function and Wick’s Theorem

第八週 Feynman Diagrams and Feynman Rules

第九週 Cross Section and Decay Width
